file.name: externalref.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: My API
  description: It ain't so wonderful, but at least it's mine.
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    email: me@theintenet.com
    name: me
paths:
  /test:
    get:
      summary: 'test'
      responses:
        200:
          description: test
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: ./vendor.schema.yaml
components:
  schemas:
    vendor:
      $ref: ./vendor.schema.yaml
    myvendor:
      $ref: ./vendor.schema.yaml
    simple:
      $ref: ./simple.yaml
    A:
      $ref: ./definitions.yaml#/$defs/A
    test:
      $ref: ./rename.yaml
    rename:
      type: string
    rename-2:
      $ref: ./rename.yaml

Error: parse: paths: /test: get: : responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: reference "./vendor.schema.yaml": resolve reference "./vendor.schema.yaml": invalid schema reference "./vendor.schema.yaml"
